name: Hungry Monsters
description:
This is my entry the Retro Platform Jam #4

As for previous one, I started from scratch on a new system I never worked on before : the Atari Lynx.

While I didn't make everything I wanted to do, I learnt a lot and was able to make my basis for any new Lynx game.

History:

11/04 : Initial version, uploaded on the last hour of the jam

12/04 : I fixed some bugs and used a valid LNX header for version 1.1

Credits:

Fadest : for make me select the Lynx for the jam and the invaluable help he provided these last weeks

LordKraken : for the technical details and help

42Bastian : for fixing sprpack so fast !

Fei : for support and made me "met" Fadest and others Lynx nuts 

My wife : for the 3 last days without complaining !
